casebody.data:
GOLDING BROS. CO., Inc., Petitioner, v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE, Respondent. No. 17. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 8, 1940. Samuel O. Clark, Jr., Asst. Atty. Gen., and Sewall Key and F. E. Youngman, Sp. Assts. to Atty. Gen., for respondent.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and PATTERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision affirmed.
